mapper.sql: symbol, name, lastSale, marketCap, IPOyear, sector, industry, date, currency
mapper.insert:
insert into stock
symbol,
name,
lastSale,
marketCap,
IPOyear,
sector,
industry,
date,
currency,

mapper.update:
update stock
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lastSale = #{lastsale,jdbcType=DOUBLE},
marketCap = #{marketcap,jdbcType=BIGINT},
IPOyear = #{ipoyear,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sector = #{sector,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE},
currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update stock set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lastSale = #{lastsale,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, marketCap = #{marketcap,jdbcType=BIGINT}, IPOyear = #{ipoyear,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sector = #{sector,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, industry = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, currency = #{currency,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where symbol = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
